price: [Fir’awn] “ergamaan keessan inni gara keessanitti ergame dhugumatti maraatuudha” jedhe.
arabic: قَالَ إِنَّ رَسُولَكُمُ ٱلَّذِيٓ أُرۡسِلَ إِلَيۡكُمۡ لَمَجۡنُونٞ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: qāla inna rasūlakumu alladhī ur'sila ilaykum lamajnūnun
